pages.text: $(li)The Pickarang is a tool that works like a boomerang pickage.$(br)$(li)You throw it, it breaks whatever it hits and comes back to you with the drops.

The Pickarang can be Enchanted with multiples enchantments:$(br)$(li)Tinted$(li)Bane of Arthropods$(li)Mending$(li)Sharpness$(li)Smite$(li)Curse of Vanishing$(li)Imperishable$(li)Lumbering$(li)Efficiency$(li)Umbreaking$(li)Fortune$(li)Silk Touch$(li)Piercing
